docs.snippet: A suburban New York prosecutor who has attracted national headlines for murder convictions in drunken driving cases and a crackdown on college entrance exam cheating is running for Congress....
docs.lead_paragraph: A suburban New York prosecutor who has attracted national headlines for murder convictions in drunken driving cases and a crackdown on college entrance exam cheating is running for Congress.

docs.snippet: A Super Bowl spread should strive to reach the level of a holiday feast....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Super Bowl spread should strive to reach the level of a holiday feast.
docs.abstract: Suggestions for a Super Bowl spread that will be as ambitious and appealing as any other holiday feast; recipes for cola-brined fried chicken, clam dip and game day nachos noted.

docs.snippet: China convicted two anti-graft campaigners on Wednesday for their roles in a protest urging officials to reveal their assets, the latest measures in a crackdown that has sparked international criticism....

headline.main: China Convicts Two Anti-Graft Activists in Crackdown

docs.snippet: As attorney general, Eric Holder has approved pursuing the death penalty in at least 34 criminal cases, upholding a long-ago pledge to Congress that he would vigorously enforce federal law even though he's not a proponent of capital punishment....
docs.lead_paragraph: As attorney general, Eric Holder has approved pursuing the death penalty in at least 34 criminal cases, upholding a long-ago pledge to Congress that he would vigorously enforce federal law even though he's not a proponent of capital punishment.

headline.main: Death Penalty Decision Imminent in Boston Bombing
